relation: Anyone can open an organization with the proper guidelines. They have many sporting events to attend, homecoming week, greek week, and a host of other activities for whatever interest you.
New restuarants have opened on campus, including Chik-fil-a.
The work is challenging and each teacher has their own style.
Always check every requirement to stay in school with each department. Go to orientation and be early as possible. Talk to your professors often throughout your course and go to all your classes.

ASU is a historically black college with predominately black students with diverse teachers. They have many more resources than any community college in the area. They offer a wide arrangement of help with major subjects.
pageTitle: Albany State University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {44444=It's an experience everyone should try. It gives students a chance to meet a lot of people on campus and make lifelong bonds. Albany is an historic black college so it has it's traditonally dorms wiley and gibson that has community bathrooms,but all the other dorms or more modern. The newest dorms was built fall 2011, 119343=At Albany State we call our dinning are The Caf.Our caf is brand new, just opened January of 2012. In the care we have four different line and a salad bar. The food in the caf is usually pretty good., 42974=We have a new student center that was built and opened the fall of 2011 its where a lot people go to talk with friends, many of the events are held in this building or outside in the amphitheatre, 196079=One trademark Albany State University has is the chimney. In 1994, the city of Albany experienced a massive flood. It wiped out the whole campus, except for the chimney that was connected to our first academic hall, Caroline Hall. The chimney has three rings around it, representing the height of the flood each day it got higher. Now, the campus is migrating to the higher part of the land. We have a bridge over the pedestrian mall that has a message written on both sides. If you're walking towards the higher side of campus, the bridge says: A past to cherish. If you're walking to the lower side it says: A future to fulfill., 311872=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 269863=I've been staying on campus since Fall 2010. I love it! I wouldn't trade it for nothing. You learn more and get that college feel on staying in the doors. From the pranks in the wee hours of the mornings to the random fire drills., 13409=Albany is a small city so it can take some time to get used to if your not from a small city yourself. It can get cold during late November and early December so please be prepared. Also, you must have transportation because most places are not walking distance., 110324=spring 2012 is my first semester off campus. when i was on campus the dorm life was i say ok. every now and then you would get students partying late make alot of noise outside, but it is ok., 19442=I advise prospective students to apply around October 1 of their senior year. To set yourself apart from the rest I implore that you submit a resume and a 1 page essay of yourself (be creative).}

textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews ikhaeer from Jonesboro, GA 12/18/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 15 out of 15 people found this review useful. 2 of 74 Categories Comments Great for these types of students great for open minded and prospective students. Tips for prospective students The most helpful tip I c an give by experience, is to STAY FOCUSED. Being away from home means no parents telling you when to be in or what to do. It is your responsibility to stay focused and not lose sight of the bigger picture. That is earning your degree. I'm not saying don't party... just know how to balance parties,studies,eating and sleeping. Bang for the buck its worth every penny. The only thing i will say is that the financial aid is a little slow with processing. but they work with you in the financial aid office. Am enjoying being here
